revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR941ND |revision=v4.x |series=N300 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/28/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR941NXV4,TE7WR940N |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.85 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32BVSIG |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''300Mbps Wireless N Router'''
[http://www.tplink.com/en/products/details/cat-9_TL-WR941ND.html Product page]
The FCC ID is not valid. Additionally, there is a new FCC filing under ID: '''TE7WR940N''' :(IC ID: 8853A-WR940N) for this same model (but perhaps not the same version).
The device is the same as the [[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v1.x]] (plus the antenna :configuration, '''N''' = integral antennas, '''ND''' = removable antennas).
The device uses an [[Atheros]] AR7240 (AR7240-AH1A) for the CPU and an AR9283. :While the device does have 3 antennas, it only has 2T2R capability (the left :and middle antennas appear to be used in a switched diversity configuration).
The default SSID is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last three octets of the WLAN MAC address.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr941nd ''TL-WR941ND'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
